channel.title: Blogs on S1kk1S
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on S1kk1S

item.title: Pentest Cypurs 3.0
item.description: Pentest Cyprus CTF Writeup This is the 3rd time Pentest Cyprus has hosted an event in Cyprus. The event was hosted locally on 2017-10-08 but now it is available for anyone to participate! The CTF can be accessed here. FYI this is my first blog post and CTF Writeup so if something is not accurate or you want to give me some advice please contact me and give me your feedback.

item.title: Hello world!
item.description: Hi my name is Vasilis Sikkis and i am a Pentester at QSecure in Cyprus. In this blog i will try to document my journey to the CyberSecurity world by posting interesting things i will find in the wild! Also i just started participating in CTFs and the main purpose of the website is to post some writeups on some of the challenges.
